Create loop_2 as a circle (circle_1) centered at (0.375, 0.375) with radius 0.1635. 4. Extrude the sketch along the normal vector with a depth of 0.2183 and no depth in the opposite direction (extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.2183, extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0). The scaling factor should be set to 0.75 (sketch_scale: 0.75). Part 2: Cylindrical Object with Tapered Top Construct a cylindrical object with a tapered top and a flat bottom. Set the scaling factor for the sketch to 0.3269 (sketch_scale: 0.3269). With the given CAD Assembly JSON, follow these instructions to construct the described shapes for each part. Pay close attention to the positioning, scaling, and orientation of each part as well as the individual curves, loops, and faces. After you complete constructing both parts, you will obtain the final shape, a three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The prism has a flat base and a flat top, and the cylindrical hole is centered along the length of the prism. The prism is symmetrical along its central axis.</description>
